This app is a real navigation tool designed for outdoors sports like hiking, bushwalking, mountain biking, kayaking and trail riding. It allows you to work in UTM or lat/lon coordinates.

Note: This version of the app is limited to storing 3 waypoints and 40 tracklog points. The paid version does not have these limits.

Features:

* View your current location in UTM or Lat/Lon formats.
* Record and/or manually enter waypoints.
* Goto a waypoint.
* Record a track log.
* Show your current location, waypoints and tracklogs on a map.
* Export waypoints and tracklogs to a KML file for viewing in Google Earth, or to a GPX file.
* Import KML or GPX files and view in the app.
* Email your current location to a friend.
* Odometer to keep track of how far you've gone.
* Magnetic compass.
* Supports both metric and US/imperial units.
* Supports datums WGS84, GDA94, AGD66 and AGD84. (Use WGS84 for NAD83)
* Can show your current location as an MGRS grid ref (WGS84 only).
* Optional walk timer.

Additional features only available in the paid version include:
* Entry of parameters for a custom datum (e.g. ED50, SAD69, OSGB36, etc)
* Elevation profile.
* Compute sun rise and set times.
* Unlimited waypoints and tracklog points.

Disclaimer: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. To save battery power you can close the app from the task manager. The developer accepts no responsibility for you getting lost while using this app.

Don't have enough people to play soccer, basketball or volleyball?

Don't want to commit to a league because of your schedule? 

Join the Just Play Community and play at a time and pitch that suits you!

Just Play is a pickup sports app. We have soccer, basketball and volleyball games in New York City, Boston, Atlanta, Detroit, Dallas and Chicago. You don't have to know anyone to play. You just find a game in the app, join and go play!



How It Works

1) Choose a game that suits you
We aim to have 20 games per day in each city. If we can do this playing great sports games will be as easy as going on a run!

2) Arrive and meet your team mates
Just Play is a community! Half of the fun is the great soccer, basketball or volleyball game. The other half of the fun is the great people you meet!

3) Play a great sports game!
Our aim is that all games are equal and fun for all. Everyone is welcome and if the teams are unequal our Just Play Host will change them.

Training Feel is an app that allows you to monitor the training load through the subjective assessment of the athlete.
To begin, athletes must complete a wellness questionnaire prior to starting the session.
Once finished, each athlete must indicate the subjective effort value that this training had, using a scale with references.
With these data, added to the duration of each session, Training Feel automatically calculates the A-C Ratio through the session-RPE method.

++++++ MAIN FEATURES +++++++

- User authentication
- Cloud database
- Team management
- Athlete management
- Management of training sessions
- Wellness Questionnaire
- Borg scale
- Excel an PDF file export
- Bar graphs for each variable
- Filter data by dates

-------- FACILITIES DATA --------

- Number of athletes
- Duration (minutes)
- Media Wellness
- Average RPE per session
- RPE session
- Ratio A / C
- Weekly average RPE
- Weekly training load
- Weekly monotony
- Weekly trining strain

--------- ATHLETES DATA ----------

- Date of the last training performed
- Latest Wellness
- Last RPE
- Borg scale
- Wellness of the session
- Sleep
- Muscle pain
- Fatigue
- Stress

Training Feel allows you to export all the data to an excel or pdf file.
